tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Gynae advice,Pregnant,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,
review:
Shashikala Hande is an excellent doctor. She is very gentle and gives time to listen to your problem very patiently. She explains everything clearly leaving you 100% satisfied. She is very friendly and supportive.

*** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ***** I want to thank Dr. Shashikala Hande for the help she had done to me. She used to solve concerns and provide required advices efficiently.

Dr. Shashikala Hande provided her guidance throughout my entire pregnancy phase till delivery. There was some complications which she handled very well and always used to approach positively. I was not enough confident about normal delivery due to intense labour pain. But she helped me in Normal Vaginal Delivery which was a dream come true for me. Her treatment and guidance has given me the happiness of Motherhood. Her support made my entire pregnancy journey smooth and successful. Me and my husband are blessed with baby boy and now my baby is just 1 month old and doing well. I am really happy. 
I'm eternally grateful and would like to Thank to Dr. Shashikala Hande from the bottom of my heart.
I highly recommend Dr. Shashikala for all who are planning for baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It is my pleasure to give the review about Dr. Shashikala Hande. I was in touch with her throughout my wife’s pregnancy and delivery. She is very friendly and explains everything whether she is introducing any medicine or why any new test needed to be done or any further step needed to be taken.

My wife is an IT professional. So, my wife was looking for normal vaginal delivery as other types of delivery like caesarean or forceps delivery is coming with different types of complications. I and my wife were not confident about the normal delivery, but Dr. Shashikala has given confidence to us that if no other complication happen during the later time of pregnancy like baby position or health issues then my wife can go for normal delivery.

The day my wife admitted in hospital she was asking for caesarean delivery, but Dr. Shashikala encouraged my wife and though normal delivery is painful, but my wife was able to do it.
I really appreciate Dr. Shashikala’s knowledge and experience regarding this matter.

Now I and my wife has been blessed by a baby boy where all people Dr. Shashikala, other doctors and nurse’s effort, involvement and blessings associated.

Thank you, Dr. Shashikala, for helping my wife to enter to Motherhood and me to Fatherhood phase of life. I highly and happily recommend Dr. Shashikala to the would-be parents for their parenthood journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We have been consulting Dr.Sashikala Mam for my wife's pregnancy. Inspite of complications associated we were blessed with a little angel last month. Special mention to Dr Sashikala, she has been extremely helpful and explains the issues/risks in detail. Ours was a high risk pregnancy with central palcenta prevaia. The doctor handled the situation very well and always adviced us through out our pregnancy. She is very coperative, friendly and a patient listener. Five star rating for excellent services provided at the hospital. If you are looking for a good maternity hospital and a well qualified doctor, don't give second thought Go for Dr. Sasikala Mam at Cloud Nine Jaynagar. Thank you Doctor for making us enter parenthood.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I've consulted Dr. Shashikala for both my pregnancies. Visited her for the 1st time, just a week before my 1st delivery. 2nd visit was on the day of delivery. Though she didn't know much abt my case, she treated me well and delivered a healthy baby thru NVD. Then i consulted her regularly for my 2nd pregnancy. On the day of delivery,I rushed into hospital arnd 7 AM with strong contractions and 7 cms dilated. She reached hospital in a very short notice (30 mins to be precise). She also notified the reception and duty doctor to send me directly to labour room and check immediately. As there was no much time, I didn't go thru preps/admission process. I delivered a healthy baby within 45 mins while my husband was still carrying out the admission formalities.
Her timely response and dedication towards work, made the entire process so smooth. If it wasn't her, I would have been in trouble! Many thanks to her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ********** ***** ** * **** **** ****** *** her treatment is beyond imagination. She tacles her patients case very well and prescribe the proper medication for all the women health related conditions. I was very happy with her behaviour towards me when I went to meet her during my tough times. She handled my case very well and I delivered a baby boy in cloud nine. Thanks to the doctor and I will always recommend her for any patients who is having complications during pregnancy and other related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had the following problems with this doctor:
1. She arrived 1 hour late to the practo appointment time.
2. She keeps the door open while consulting - for example, we could hear her tell the patient before us **** *** **** *** *** ****** *** *** ******* We felt that was a complete violation of privacy.*** *** ****** ** ***** ******** ** * *** ***** ******* **** ** *********** ** ******* ** *** ********* 
4. It did not feel like she cared for the patients.. *** ********** *** ****** ************** It felt a bit disappointing.
5. The doctor does not have an ultrasound scan machine inside her office and sent us down the street in a crowded public diagnostics center for the first ultrasound scan. *** **** *** ******* ***** *** *** **** * ***** *** ************ **** *** **** ***** ******* **** *** ****** *** **** 

Overall a very bad experience and would not recommend this doctor (at least not in this location) *** ********* ***** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is understanding and up to date with all gynae related problems. She has a modern approach and understands that women have a career to make & that they have a choice about when they want to start a family. She doesn’t pressure you to marry and start making babies like how other gynaes do. She understands endometriosis well and knows her treatments. I ve stage 3 endometriosis & I’m fortunate to be treated by her. I have been consulting her for over 2 years and I couldn’t be happier.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I had been to the doctor 4 months ago for pcos issue. And was asked to go through blood test and scanning.. after which was prescribed with few medicines.. 
Was asked to visit after 4 months.. and it happened that she started shouting at me when i said have taken medicines for 4 months and there is no much progress.. and instead of being a support she said i would get diabetes coz of weight and was prescribed with anti daibetic medications for the next 8 months.. she was so rude *** ******** ***** ********Did tell her that have been following everything that was told even with exersice there is no improvement.. was asked to consult dietitian and not return to her until i have wieght loss.. 
Totally understand that weight is a concerns.. *** ** * ****** ***** ** * *** ** ****** *** **** ***** ******

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited the doctor for my wife regarding frequent urge for urination, uti infection. On the first meet the doc prescribed urine culture tests for both of us which came out to be negative. ***** **** *** *** ******** *** *** ** **** ** ** **** ***** ** *** **** ***** *** started referring us to urogynecologist (for the same problem for which we consulted Dr Shashikala) and to physician(as bp was a bit high 140/100). ** ** ******* *** ***** ** * **** *** ** ********* ******* ****** *** *** ********** ** *** ***** *** *** ***** ****** * ***** ********* **** *** ** *******The receptionist does not understand English well and on call she said the free follow up is only till 1 day after consultation but when I visited the clinic she said it is upto 3 days after consultation.
